#summary help user to begin use it.

= how to use =

1.download the source code by SVN. 

2.make install on Linux. 

3.try *tsf _tsfilename_* command.

= add your own format =

when you want to parse and edit your private format, 
or you think my parse is not correct

1.add your own format file refer to format file in /main/format/ . 

2.place it to /main/format . 

3.edit /main/format/format to include your own format file. 

4.make install again.
